title: My CareCrew – Cancer Support
description: FIGHT CANCER WITH YOUR CREW Cancer is hard! We get it! We’ve been there! Created by patients for patients, My CareCrew makes it easy to… · Ask for help · Manage inflow of help offers from friends & family · Track and share symptoms, mood & updates · Share a Wishlist of products, services, and experiences you need or wish for ◉ REACH OUT FOR HELP The app makes it easy to ask for help along every step of your cancer journey. Download the app, create an account and setup your CareCrew by inviting friends & family to your private cancer support group. From the home screen select Request, choose the help you want, insert request details and ask anyone in your CareCrew cancer support group to pitch in. Attach pictures, documents, voice messages, and more taking the stress out of asking for help to deal with leukemia, breast cancer, colorectal cancer, lung cancer, prostate cancer and more. ◉ OFFER HELP Help cancer patients without overwhelming them. Simply share all the ways you are available to help and let them select the help they need most. Friends, family and caregivers can send voice messages, attach pictures, documents and stay in touch with the cancer patients at every step of their cancer care. ◉ CANCER SUPPORT TRACKER Track every step of the cancer journey using tools such as the help tracker, wellness tracker, wishlists, notification reminders, journal and more. ◉ CREATE WISHLISTS Create wishlists and get the things you need most from your cancer community with the My CareCrew wishlist. From adding gift ideas and health care services you want to items you need and experiences you wish for, the wishlists feature is the easy way to do it. ◉ JOURNAL & SHARE Whether you are undergoing chemo, or you are at the early stages of your cancer, you can keep everyone updated with My CareCrew. Journal your thoughts, capture mood & symptoms and post status updates to your CareCrew and social media. It’s so much easier to go on this cancer treatment journey surrounded by friends and family. ► Now get My CareCrew and make everyday challenges, as a cancer patient or caregiver, a little more bearable!
descriptionHTML:
FIGHT CANCER WITH YOUR CREW
Cancer is hard! We get it! We’ve been there! Created by patients for patients, My CareCrew makes it easy to…
· Ask for help
· Manage inflow of help offers from friends & family
· Track and share symptoms, mood & updates
· Share a Wishlist of products, services, and experiences you need or wish for

◉ REACH OUT FOR HELP
The app makes it easy to ask for help along every step of your cancer journey. Download the app, create an account and setup your CareCrew by inviting friends & family to your private cancer support group. From the home screen select Request, choose the help you want, insert request details and ask anyone in your CareCrew cancer support group to pitch in. Attach pictures, documents, voice messages, and more taking the stress out of asking for help to deal with leukemia, breast cancer, colorectal cancer, lung cancer, prostate cancer and more.

◉ OFFER HELP
Help cancer patients without overwhelming them. Simply share all the ways you are available to help and let them select the help they need most. Friends, family and caregivers can send voice messages, attach pictures, documents and stay in touch with the cancer patients at every step of their cancer care.

◉ CANCER SUPPORT TRACKER
Track every step of the cancer journey using tools such as the help tracker, wellness tracker, wishlists, notification reminders, journal and more.

◉ CREATE WISHLISTS
Create wishlists and get the things you need most from your cancer community with the My CareCrew wishlist. From adding gift ideas and health care services you want to items you need and experiences you wish for, the wishlists feature is the easy way to do it.

◉ JOURNAL & SHARE
Whether you are undergoing chemo, or you are at the early stages of your cancer, you can keep everyone updated with My CareCrew. Journal your thoughts, capture mood & symptoms and post status updates to your CareCrew and social media. It’s so much easier to go on this cancer treatment journey surrounded by friends and family.

► Now get My CareCrew and make everyday challenges, as a cancer patient or caregiver, a little more bearable!
summary: Helps patients and caregivers manage everyday challenges during cancer journey.
